The client is a single mother with 2 school-going children. She is a low-wage earner and has limited resources and no ability to purchase the necessary household items, as such, she is unable to move in with her children.

Having a Sink with stand platform would provide the family with some basic kitchen appliances for her to be more ready to live in the house with her two schooling children.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services SSO @ Taman Jurong
